item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Add a

System.out.println("mark");

Right after the command check. If you see “mark” in the command prompt, then keep moving it (into the player update method) until it doesn’t show up. When it doesn’t, you know the previous line is what’s causing the problem.
